projects.name: HealthCare AI Document Processor
projects.description: Built an AI-powered system to extract and classify information from medical records, lab reports, and insurance claims using LLMs and NLP.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced document processing time by 75%, achieved 94% extraction accuracy
projects.lessons_learned: Early involvement of compliance team is crucial for healthcare projects

projects.name: Financial Fraud Detection System
projects.description: Developed a real-time fraud detection system using ML models to identify suspicious transactions and automate alerts.
projects.outcome_details: Detected 40% more fraud cases, reduced false positives by 60%
projects.lessons_learned: Feature engineering is critical for financial ML models

projects.name: Government Citizen Services Chatbot
projects.description: Created an AI chatbot to handle citizen inquiries about government services, permits, and applications.
projects.outcome_details: Handled 70% of inquiries without human intervention, 4.5/5 user satisfaction
projects.lessons_learned: Government projects require extensive stakeholder alignment

projects.name: Retail Demand Forecasting Platform
projects.description: Built a predictive analytics platform for inventory demand forecasting using historical sales data and external factors.
projects.outcome_details: Improved forecast accuracy by 35%, reduced overstock by 25%
projects.lessons_learned: Data cleaning takes more time than initially estimated

projects.name: Insurance Claims Automation
projects.description: Automated insurance claims processing using document AI to extract claim details and route to appropriate handlers.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced claims processing time from 5 days to 4 hours for 80% of claims
projects.lessons_learned: Hybrid AI+human workflow is more reliable than full automation

projects.name: Enterprise Data Lake Migration
projects.description: Migrated legacy data warehouse to a modern cloud-native data lake on AWS with real-time ingestion pipelines.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced data processing costs by 50%, enabled real-time analytics
projects.lessons_learned: Parallel run period is essential for data migration projects

projects.name: HR Process Automation (RPA)
projects.description: Implemented RPA bots to automate repetitive HR tasks including onboarding, leave management, and payroll processing.
projects.outcome_details: Automated 15 HR processes, saved 200+ hours per month
projects.lessons_learned: User training is critical for RPA adoption

projects.name: Contract Analysis AI Agent
projects.description: Built an AI agent to analyze legal contracts, extract key clauses, identify risks, and summarize obligations.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced contract review time by 60%, identified 25% more risk clauses
projects.lessons_learned: RAG with chunking strategies significantly improves accuracy

projects.name: Patient Scheduling Optimization
projects.description: Developed an ML-based scheduling system to optimize patient appointments and reduce wait times at a hospital network.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced average wait time by 30%, but adoption was slower than expected
projects.lessons_learned: Change management is as important as technical implementation

projects.name: Supply Chain Visibility Dashboard
projects.description: Created a real-time dashboard for supply chain visibility with predictive alerts for potential disruptions.
projects.outcome_details: Provided 360Â° supply chain visibility, reduced disruption response time by 45%
projects.lessons_learned: Event-driven architecture is essential for real-time systems

projects.name: Regulatory Compliance Monitoring
projects.description: Built an AI system to monitor regulatory changes, assess impact, and generate compliance reports automatically.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced compliance monitoring effort by 70%, zero missed regulatory updates
projects.lessons_learned: Domain expert involvement is crucial for compliance projects

projects.name: Customer Support AI Assistant
projects.description: Deployed an AI-powered customer support assistant capable of handling orders, returns, and product inquiries.
projects.outcome_details: Resolved 65% of queries without human intervention, improved CSAT by 15%
projects.lessons_learned: Fallback to human agents should be seamless

projects.name: Clinical Trial Data Analytics
projects.description: Built a data analytics platform for clinical trial data management, adverse event detection, and reporting.
projects.outcome_details: Accelerated data analysis by 50%, improved adverse event detection accuracy
projects.lessons_learned: Regulatory documentation should be built alongside development

projects.name: Internal Knowledge Base RAG System
projects.description: Implemented a RAG-based internal knowledge base for employees to query company policies, procedures, and documentation.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced time to find information by 80%, high employee adoption rate
projects.lessons_learned: Iterative prompt refinement improves RAG accuracy significantly

projects.name: E-commerce Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Developed a personalized product recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and content-based approaches.
projects.outcome_details: Increased average order value by 18%, click-through rate up by 25%
projects.lessons_learned: Hybrid recommendation approaches outperform single methods
